Movie.title: Logan
Movie.summary: In the near future, a weary Logan cares for an ailing Professor X in a hide out on the Mexican border. But Logan's attempts to hide from the world and his legacy are up-ended when a young mutant arrives, being pursued by dark forces.

Movie.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
Movie.summary: A woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in postapocalyptic Australia in search for her home-land with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper, and a drifter named Max.

Movie.title: Deadpool
Movie.summary: A fast-talking mercenary with a morbid sense of humor is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers and a quest for revenge.

Movie.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
Movie.summary: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's Mightiest Heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plans.

Movie.title: Sully
Movie.summary: The story of Chesley Sullenberger, an American pilot who became a hero after landing his damaged plane on the Hudson River in order to save the flight's passengers and crew.

Movie.title: The LEGO Batman Movie
Movie.summary: Bruce Wayne must not only deal with the criminals of Gotham City, but also the responsibility of raising a boy he adopted.

Movie.title: Kong: Skull Island
Movie.summary: A team of explorers and soldiers travel to an uncharted island in the Pacific, unaware that they are crossing into the domain of monsters, including the mythic Kong.

Movie.title: Arrival
Movie.summary: When twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world, linguistics professor Louise Banks is tasked with interpreting the language of the apparent alien visitors.

Movie.title: Captain America: Civil War
Movie.summary: Political interference in the Avengers' activities causes a rift between former allies Captain America and Iron Man.

Movie.title: Rogue One
Movie.summary: The Rebel Alliance makes a risky move to steal the plans for the Death Star, setting up the epic saga to follow.

Movie.title: Doctor Strange
Movie.summary: A former neurosurgeon embarks on a journey of healing only to be drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

Movie.title: Suicide Squad
Movie.summary: A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force. Their first mission: save the world from the apocalypse.

Movie.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
Movie.summary: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.
